definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: RemoteException - Thrown when the method failed due to a system-level failure.
sentences.chinese: 方法拋出該異常表示一個由系統級錯誤引起的失敗。

sentences.english: Right. I have witnessed some applications that in fact rarely or never throw exceptions.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我知道有些應用程序極少或從來不會拋出異常。

sentences.english: The car stopped suddenly and I was catapulted through the windshield.
sentences.chinese: 汽車突然停下，我被拋出擋風玻璃的外面。

sentences.english: Otherwise, it should throw an exception.
The collection will be empty after this call returns (unless it throws an exception).
sentences.chinese: 方法返回後集合將爲空除非拋出異常。

sentences.english: RemoteException - The EJB object could not be obtained because of a system-level failure.
sentences.chinese: 因爲系統級錯誤而不能獲得EJB對象時拋出。

sentences.english: Tang finally struck table to throw after the dragon he or she this come of true aim.
sentences.chinese: 唐繼龍最後拍着桌子拋出了自己此來的真實意圖。

sentences.english: Jack dabbed his rope on the steer.
sentences.chinese: 傑克拋出繩索套住了那頭小公牛。

sentences.english: This error is thrown during the initialization phase of class loading.
sentences.chinese: 這個錯誤在類裝入的初始化階段拋出。

sentences.english: In what direction should Tahi throw the ball so that it travels directly towards Rowena?
sentences.chinese: 球的運動方向與拋出方向關係如何？

sentences.english: If an exception is thrown, then the exception indicates the cause of the failure.
sentences.chinese: 如果拋出了異常，那麼這個異常會指出失敗的原因。

sentences.english: It is thrown as a result of incompatible types being found in a type comparison. The JVM specification says a that ClassCastException is
sentences.chinese: 它是在類型比較中發現不兼容類型的時候拋出的。

sentences.english: So it's not defined. But in fact, what this did was it threw an exception.
sentences.chinese: 這是未定義，但實際上，這裏做的就是拋出一個異常。

sentences.english: It throws an exception if it finds any nested elements.
sentences.chinese: 如果遇到嵌套的元素就會拋出異常。

sentences.english: If this library is not found, the error is thrown.
sentences.chinese: 如果找不到這個庫，就會拋出這個錯誤。

sentences.english: The under the leg forehand throw is one of the easier sidearm throws to master.
sentences.chinese: 正手腿下拋出是比較容易掌握手槍之一拋出。

definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
lit. the night-blooming cactus shows once/flash in the pan (idiom)/short-lived
to bombard/to bomb/(fig.) to criticize/to roast
to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
to raise one's head/to perk up
to throw off/to struggle free of/Taiwan pr. [zheng1 tuo1]
